archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0042
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, when I buy via a channel that requires delivery/pickup, I want to be able to see the available pickup/delivery options with timeframes and pricing, so that I can make an educated choice on my delivery option

properties.value: OOTB (delivery items), which system should verify and based on what type of premise which delivery methods are available for a customer? To be discussed with the Terminals team. The delivery options should depend on the delivery address. Technical details to be discussed. Different options based on delivery address/location. Some rules based on geo areas needed in Comarch BSS.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
